scripts.build: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build && electron-packager . "Energy Game" --platform=win32 --arch=x64 --out=dist/packaged --overwrite --icon=icon.ico --prune=false --deref-symlinks=true --no-asar
scripts.build-exe: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build && pkg server.js --compress Brotli --targets node18-win-x64 --output dist/Energy-Game.exe
scripts.build-vercel: npm --prefix backend run build && npm --prefix frontend run build && npm run copy-frontend
scripts.copy-frontend: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const src = 'frontend/dist'; const dst = 'backend/dist/public'; if (!fs.existsSync(dst)) fs.mkdirSync(dst, {recursive: true}); fs.cpSync(src, dst, {recursive: true});"
